name: specialist-login.toml
rawContent:
# Specialist Login Route
# Phone-based authentication for specialists

[route]
id = "specialist-login"
path = "/prototype/specialist/login"
title = "Specialist Login"

[page]
type = "public"
role = "guest"

[page.description]
summary = "Specialist onboarding and phone authentication"
features = [
  "Phone number input with formatting",
  "OTP verification (6 digits)",
  "Onboarding slides explaining the app",
  "Skip intro option"
]

[relations]
guards = ["public"]
roles = ["specialist"]
platforms = ["specialist-app"]
useCases = ["authenticate-phone"]
components = ["phone-auth-form"]
events = ["auth-otp-sent", "auth-verified"]

[implementation]
component = "LoginScreen"
file = "src/prototype/pages/specialist/LoginScreen.tsx"
status = "implemented"
